lameonj.encoder.blade

Interface LAMEOnJBlade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LAMEOnJBladeImpl

    public interface LAMEOnJBlade
    The LAMEOnJBlade is the starting interface of the LAMEOnJ utilities using an object oriented fashion to work with the LAME reflected C elements using the Blade MP3 Encoder API.

        BeVersion getVersion()
        Returns data about the LAME version used.
        To construct the BeVersion object, the method BladeMP3EncDLL.beVersion(lame.blade.BE_VERSION) is called.
        Returns:
        the version object containing the LAME info.

      • initStream

        BeStream initStream(BeConfig beConfig)
        Creates (initializes) a new LAME encoding stream.
        The returned BeStream is created and initialized with the data returned by the call BladeMP3EncDLL.beInitStream(BE_CONFIG,NativeInteger,NativeInteger,NativeInteger).
        Parameters:
        beConfig - the encoding configuration object used to create the stream.
        Returns:
        a new opened encoding stream.

      • encode

        void encode(java.lang.String wavFile,
          java.lang.String mp3File,
          BeConfig beConfig)
        Encodes the input WAV file and writes the MP3 output to the specified file.
        The file must be a WAV file.

        If VBR tag info is specified is automatically added.

        Parameters:
        wavFile - the input path of WAV file to be encoded.
        mp3File - the output path of the MP3 file to be encoded.
        beConfig - the encoding configuration info used.
        See Also:
        encode(InputStream,OutputStream,BeConfig,boolean)

      • encode

        void encode(java.io.InputStream input,
          java.io.OutputStream mp3Output,
          BeConfig beConfig,
          boolean isWav)
        Encodes the input stream and writes the MP3 output to the specified output stream.

        If the isWav parameter is set to true the stream (is supposed) starts with a WAV header, else is considered as a LPCM stream.

        Streams are NOT closed and VBR info can not be added.

        Parameters:
        input - the input stream to be encoded.
        mp3Output - the output stream to write the MP3 encoded output.
        beConfig - the encoding configuration info used.
        isWav - if the input stream has a WAV header.
